title: Add FO-03 to navigation config
description:
Add FO-03 entry to the navigation configuration.

File to modify:
- `components/navigation/nav.config.ts`

Add FO-03 entry following the same pattern as FO-01 and FO-02:
- Main link to /fo-03
- Children for info page if needed

Reference FO-02 entry for the pattern.
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'fo-03' components/navigation/nav.config.ts returns success; npm run build succeeds with new navigation
closed_reason: Added FO-03 navigation entry to nav.config.ts following FO-02 pattern. Entry includes Demo (/fo-03) and Info (/fo-03/info) children, positioned after FO-02 and before Settings.
